official_title: A bill to provide that surplus dairy products should be provided to carry out the temporary emergency food assistance program before certain dairy export programs to extend such dairy export programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to extend through FY 1991: (1) the dairy export incentive program; and (2) the export sales of dairy products program. Amends the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to state that such dairy export programs shall not be operated in a way that will reduce dairy products available for the temporary emergency food assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to provide that surplus dairy products should be provided to carry out the temporary emergency food assistance program before certain dairy export programs to extend such dairy export programs, and for other purposes.
